org.sbml.squeezer.gui
Class LayoutHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.sbml.squeezer.gui.LayoutHelper

public class LayoutHelper
extends Object

A helper class that provides several methods for working with a GridBagLayout.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Andreas Dräger

Constructor Summary
LayoutHelper(Container cont)
          Creates a new GridBaglayout and associates this with the given container.
